dmca.title: Copyright Infringement

http://www.tibettravel.org/tibettravel/Html/200751402930-1.html (Content of their 'In Town' and 'Out of Town' copied ours.)



**This complainant already has a signature on file with us.
Below, please find the original complaint:

ATTN: Google, Inc.
Google Legal Support, DMCA Complaints
[private]
Mountain View, CA, [private], USA
Fax: [private]

FROM: [private]
Tibettrip.com - Xi'an Diamond Network Co. Ltd.
[private]
[private]
Xi'an, Shaanxi, [private], P.R.C.
Tel: [private]
Fax: [private]
E-mail:[private]@gmail.com

SUBJ: Copyright infringement
DATE: September 28, 2007

Dear Google, Inc.

1. I, the webmaster of www.tibettrip.com, am on behalf of our company, Xi'an Diamond Network Co. Ltd. I am looking forward for your concerns about the websites copied the below pages from our website.

The offender is www.tibettravel.org. They copied 20 pages of contents from our website without our permission. So we are here to ask for your investigation and removal of the infringing pages from your search result.

2. Hereunder is the detailed information on the pages they have copied from our website:

(1)Search Query "Tips for Photography Fans 200742311855"
Our Copyrighted Page:
http://www.tibettrip.com/essential/photograph.htm
Infringing Web Page:
http://www.tibettravel.org/tibettravel/html/200742311855-1.Html (Their first five paragraphs copied our entire content.)

(2)Search Query "Food & Drink 20075403856"
Our Copyrighted Page:
http://www.tibettrip.com/essential/food_drink.htm
Infringing Web Page:
http://www.tibettravel.org/tibettravel/Html/20075403856-1.html

(3)Search Query "Tibetan Buddhism Figures tibettravel"
Our Copyrighted Page:
http://www.tibettrip.com/features/figures.htm
Infringing Web Page:
http://www.tibettravel.org/tibettravel/Html/200753234131-1.html

(4) Search Query "Reincarnation System tibettravel"
Our Copyrighted Page:
http://www.tibettrip.com/features/religion/reincarnation.htm
Infringing Web Page:
http://www.tibettravel.org/tibettravel/Html/2006324183126-1.html

(5) Search Query "Reincarnation System tibettravel"
Our Copyrighted Page:
http://web.archive.org/web/20020415105142/http://tibettrip.com/features/religion/reincarnation.htm (our April 2002 version)
Infringing Web Page:
http://www.tibettravel.org/tibettravel/Html/2006331153312-1.html

(6) Search Query "Dalai Lama and Panchen Lama tibettravel"
Our Copyrighted Page:
http://www.tibettrip.com/features/panchen.htm
Infringing Web Page:
http://www.tibettravel.org/tibettravel/Html/2006331152925-1.html

(7) Search Query "2006331155748"
Our Copyrighted Page:
http://web.archive.org/web/20020228010538/http://tibettrip.com/features/monastery.htm
(our February 2002 version)
Infringing Web Page:
http://www.tibettravel.org/tibettravel/Html/2006331155748-1.html

(8) Search Query "Religious Life tibettravel"
Our Copyrighted Page:
http://www.tibettrip.com/features/religion/life.htm
Infringing Web Page:
http://www.tibettravel.org/tibettravel/html/20075401028-1.html

(9) Search Query "Butter Sculpture tibettravel"
Our Copyrighted Page:
http://www.tibettrip.com/features/objects.htm
Infringing Web Page:
http://www.tibettravel.org/tibettravel/html/20075401330-1.html

(10) Search Query "tibet Stupa tibettravel"
Our Copyrighted Page:
http://www.tibettrip.com/features/stupas.htm
Infringing Web Page:
http://www.tibettravel.org/tibettravel/html/20075402248-1.html

(11) Search Query "Mt. Everest (Mt. Qomolangma) tibettravel"
Our Copyrighted Page:
http://www.tibettrip.com/cityguide/everest.htm
Infringing Web Page:
http://www.tibettravel.org/tibettravel/html/2006329155028-1.html

(12) Search Query "Shigatse Attractions tibettravel"
Our Copyrighted Page:
http://www.tibettrip.com/shigatse/attractions.htm
Infringing Web Page:
http://www.tibettravel.org/tibettravel/html/2007541590-1.Html

(13) Search Query "Shigatse Overview tibettravel"
Our Copyrighted Page:
http://www.tibettrip.com/shigatse/
Infringing Web Page:
http://www.tibettravel.org/tibettravel/html/20075415652-1.Html

(14) Search Query "Norbulingka map tibettravel"
Our Copyrighted Page:
http://web.archive.org/web/20010619111249/http://www.tibettrip.com/lhasa/norbulingka.htm (our June 2001 version)
Infringing Web Page:
http://www.tibettravel.org/tibettravel/html/2006324122420-1.Html

(15) Search Query "Lhasa Attractions tibettravel"
Our Copyrighted Page:
http://www.tibettrip.com/lhasa/attractions.htm
Infringing Web Page:
http://www.tibettravel.org/tibettravel/Html/20075412534-1.html

(16) Search Query "Lhasa Entertainment tibettravel"
Our Copyrighted Page:
http://www.tibettrip.com/lhasa/entertainment.htm
Infringing Web Page:
http://www.tibettravel.org/tibettravel/Html/20075413228-1.html

(17) Search Query "There are a lot of very interesting things to buy tibettravel"
Our Copyrighted Page:
http://www.tibettrip.com/lhasa/shopping.htm
Infringing Web Page:
http://www.tibettravel.org/tibettravel/Html/20075414117-1.html

(18) Search Query "Lhasa is the highest city in the world and is the least tibettravel"
Our Copyrighted Page:
http://www.tibettrip.com/lhasa/fast-facts.htm
Infringing Web Page:
http://www.tibettravel.org/tibettravel/html/20075414541-1.html

(19) Search Query "Naqu travel tips tibettravel"
http://www.tibettrip.com/nakchu/fast-facts.htm
Infringing Web Page:
http://www.tibettravel.org/tibettravel/html/200632417722-1.html

(20) Search Query "Nakchu Transportation, How to Get to Nakchu tibettravel"
Our Copyrighted Page:
http://www.tibettrip.com/nakchu/transportation.htm
Infringing Web Page:
http://www.tibettravel.org/tibettravel/Html/200751402930-1.html (Content of their 'In Town' and 'Out of Town' copied ours.)

3. My contact information:
[private]
[private]
www.tibettrip.com - Xi'an Diamond Network Co. Ltd.
[private]
[private]
Xi'an, Shaanxi,[private], P.R.C.

4. The contact info of the copyright offender www.tibettravel.org is:
Email: [private]@hotmail.com
Tel: [private]
Fax: [private]
5. I have a good faith belief that use of the copyrighted materials described above on the infringing web page is not authorized by the copyright owner, its agent, or the law.

6. I swear, under penalty of perjury, that the information in the notification is accurate and that I am the copyright owner or am authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is allegedly infringed.

Thank you very much!

Yours sincerely,

[private]

Ps.: According to your instruction, all our copyright complaint can be sent to you only via email. Please refer to our faxed document to you on July 6th, 2007.
